DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate effect testosterone replacement men renal failure ( dialysis ) also low testosterone . Specifically , investigator assess change requirement Erythropoietin Stimulating agent .
DOC.detailed_description: Testosterone replacement increase hemoglobin count . This therefore decrease requirement Erythropoietin Stimulating agent .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Men age 1880 year age . 2 . Renal failure hemodialysis 3 . Free testosterone < 5 ng/dl . 4 . Willing randomized intramuscular ( IM ) testosterone placebo 5 . Currently get intravenous Epoetin alfa 1 . Use testosterone treatment currently past 6 month , include use counter androgen contain health supplement . 2 . Congestive heart Failure , class III IV . 3 . Baseline hemoglobin > 12 g/dl . 4 . Allergic reaction testosterone Vehicle ( i.e . Peanut oil ) 5. prostate specific antigen > 4 ng/ml . 6 . History Prostate Cancer . 7 . Liver enzymes > twice upper limit normal . 8 . HIV hepatitis C. 9 . Severe untreated obstructive sleep apnea ( define apneahypopnea index > 30 ) . 10 . Subjects warfarin blood thinner . 11 . Active infection ( foot ulcer ) 12 . History adverse event testosterone use past .
